text: David Houston may refer to: * David F. Houston (1866–1940), American politician, Secretary of Agriculture and the Treasury under President Wilson * David Houston (singer) (1935–1993), American country music singer * David Houston (zoologist), British zoologist * David Houston, British Army officer and Lord Lieutenant of Sutherland, 1992–2005 * David Houston (footballer) (born 1948), Scottish footballer and manager
title: David Houston
